articles.author: Manon Dark
articles.description: TENSIONS between Russia and Ukraine have the potential to escalate into a European or even a World war, a military expert has warned.
articles.title: World War 3 fears as expert warns Ukraine ‘crisis has potential to escalate’ in weeks - Daily Express

The UK medical regulator said Saturday that out of 30 people who suffered blood clots after receiving the Oxford-AstraZeneca vaccine, sev… [+2149 chars]
articles.description: The UK medical regulator said Saturday that out of 30 people who suffered blood clots after receiving the Oxford-AstraZeneca vaccine, seven have died. The British acknowledgement of deaths comes as several European countries have paused the use of the AstraZe…
articles.title: Seven deaths in UK among AstraZeneca jab recipients after blood clots: medical regulator - Guardian
